description:
Lightweight replacement of Lenovo Vantage for Lenovo Legion laptops.

Lenovo Legion Toolkit (LLT) is a utility created for Lenovo Legion laptops, that allows changing a couple of features that are only available in Lenovo Vantage or Legion Zone.
What's Changed
Announcement
This fork has linked to crowdin LenovoLegionToolkit-Unofficial
Contributions to the localization efforts are warmly welcomed and greatly appreciated!
General
- Fix QA hyperlink by @Ace-Radom in #32
- Resolved an issue where caused Enable Logging not working properly. In the 2.26.9.5, Enable Enable Logging will make next launch start with logging.
- Added Legion Space Disabler
- Added notification for switching the dashboard style.
- LenovoLegionToolkit will no longer shut down when an unhandled error occurs.
  Instead, LLT will show a Snackbar.
- Using the newest LibreHardwareMonitor library.
Due to GPL-3.0 license requirements, You need to download the PawnIO by yourself. Sorry for the inconvient.
New Contributors
- @Ace-Radom made their first contribution in #32
Full Changelog: https://github.com/XKaguya/LenovoLegionToolkit/compare/v2.26.9.4...v2.26.9.5
